sentences.en: Do not undertake strenuous exercise for a few hours after a meal to allow food to digest.
sentences.cn: 饭后几个小时不要从事剧烈运动，以便食物能够消化。

sentences.en: Dr Johnson undertook the task of writing a comprehensive English dictionary.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊博士担负起编写一本综合性英语词典的工作。

sentences.en: He undertook to edit the text himself.
sentences.cn: 他承诺亲自编辑正文。

sentences.en: He undertook to pay the money back in six months.
sentences.cn: 他保证在六个月之内还钱。

sentences.en: I can undertake that you will enjoy the play.
sentences.cn: 我保证你会喜欢这个剧.

sentences.en: I want you to undertake all the responsibility.
sentences.cn: 我要你承担所有的责任.

sentences.en: I'll leave you to undertake an important mission.
sentences.cn: 我要让你承担一项重要使命.

sentences.en: I'll undertake for your security.
sentences.cn: 我将保证你的安全.

sentences.en: I'll undertake to land them on our coast.
sentences.cn: 我负责使他们在我们的海岸登陆.

sentences.en: If the equipment is not up to the agreed specifications and quality, we will undertake to replace them.
sentences.cn: 如果设备达不到议定的规格质量, 我们将负责调换.

sentences.en: If you undertake the project, you are bound to encounter difficulties.
sentences.cn: 如果你承接这项工程的话, 免不了会遇到许多困难.

sentences.en: If you will undertake the affair, I shall be very grateful.
sentences.cn: 要是你愿意承办这件事, 我将不胜感激.

sentences.en: It seemed a singularly ill-judged enterprise for Truman to undertake.
sentences.cn: 这对于杜鲁门来说似乎是一项特别不明智的事业。

sentences.en: Low levels of profitability mean there is a lack of incentive to undertake new investment.
sentences.cn: 利润率低意味着缺乏新投资的动力.

sentences.en: Regency Opera have scored something of a coup by persuading her to undertake the role.
sentences.cn: 雷根希歌剧院说服她扮演这一角色从而取得了巨大成功。

sentences.en: She undertook the task of monitoring the elections.
sentences.cn: 她承担了监督选举的任务。

sentences.en: The jury is still out on what kind of solutions we might undertake.
sentences.cn: 尚未确定我们可能采取何种解决办法。

sentences.en: University professors both teach and undertake research.
sentences.cn: 大学教授既要教学又要从事研究工作。

sentences.en: We can't undertake that you will make a profit.
sentences.cn: 我们不能保证你会获利.

sentences.en: Who will undertake the job of decorating the auditorium?
sentences.cn: 谁来负责装饰礼堂的工作?

words.tran_cn: 承担者；承办人；殡仪业者

trans.tran_en: to accept that you are responsible for a piece of work, and start to do it

trans.tran_cn: 承担， 着手做； 同意， 答应， 保证
trans.tran_en: to accept that you are responsible for a piece of work, and start to do it
